content.html: 'Twas the night before Christmas, when all through the cloud, Not a server was stirring, not even a route! The pagers were placed by the bedside with care, While warning anyone that deploying THIS Friday beware!
content.value:
'Twas the night before Christmas, when all through the cloud,

Not a server was stirring, not even a route!

The pagers were placed by the bedside with care,

While warning anyone that deploying THIS Friday beware!
